title: Trying to figure out how show my team how much gold I need for the next item
body:
I hear people say Alt click
BUT ON WHAT?!!
Been trying to figure it out on my own without much luck...
Any help would be appreciated 
mehehehehehe

replies.body:
If you **Alt+Left-click** on the item in the shop (E.g. Frozen Heart) it will ping how much gold you need in order to buy that item to your team in chat.

I hope this helped!
there is an setting for this no ? you click on your gold or flash and the team will see it. But how does that setting called again?
ahh I have been right clicking all this time...
In case no one has told you yet, you Alt + Left Click the item you want to ping the gold needed for.
You have to press alt + click on the item you want to show (in the shop ofc).
